sourcesContent:
import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { createOrder } from '../actions/orderActions' import { ORDER_CREATE_RESET } from '../constants/orderConstants' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const orderCreate = useSelector(state => state.orderCreate); const {order, error, success } = orderCreate; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); cart.prices = [['Items',0], ['Shipping',0], ['Tax',0], ['Total',0]]; cart.prices[0][1] = (cart.cartItems.reduce((acc,item) => acc += (item.price * item.qty),0)).toFixed(2); cart.prices[1][1] = (cart.prices[0][1]> 2000 ? 0 : 200).toFixed(2) cart.prices[2][1] = Number(0.05 * cart.prices[0][1]).toFixed(2); cart.prices[3][1] = cart.prices.reduce((acc,item) => acc += Number(item[1]),0).toFixed(2) const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { if(success){ navigate(`/order/${order._id}`); dispatch({ type: ORDER_CREATE_RESET }); } if(!cart.paymentMethod){ navigate('/payment'); } },[navigate,success,order,cart,dispatch]); const placeOrder = () => { dispatch(createOrder({ orderItems: cart.cartItems, shippingAddress: cart.shippingAddress, paymentMethod: cart.paymentMethod, itemsPrice: cart.itemsPrice, shippingPrice: cart.shippingPrice, taxPrice: cart.taxPrice, totalPrice: cart.totalPrice, })) } return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items: ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax: ${cart.taxPrice} Total: ${cart.totalPrice} {error && {error}}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
